mapper.select: SELECT user_num, user_email, user_pw, user_pwCheck, user_name, user_phone, user_gender, user_joinDate FROM USER ORDER BY user_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (user_email, user_pw, user_pwCheck, user_name, user_phone, user_gender) VALUES (#{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{user_pwCheck}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_gender})
